title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 10 data points.
Overall Average attendance has increased over the Year.

Average attendance is slightly increasing from 2009/10 to 2012/13, roughly constant from 2012/13 to 2015/16, slightly increasing from 2015/16 to 2017/18, and lastly roughly constant from 2017/18 to 2018/19.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016/17 and 2017/18.
Max Average attendance about 38495.0 was recorded at Year 2017/18
Min Average attendance about 34215.0 was recorded at Year 2009/10
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2011/12 to 2013/14.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2009/10 to 2011/12.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017/18 to 2018/19.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016/17 to 2017/18.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015/16 to 2016/17.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014/15 to 2015/16.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013/14 to 2014/15.
